meanings.definition: To synchronize (a sound recording) with a visual image after filming.
meanings.sent1: The audio was postsynced to match the video perfectly.
meanings.sent2: They postsynced the dialogue in the movie during editing.
meanings.sent3: The postsynced music made the scene even more exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter postsynced with the joyful expressions on screen.
meanings.sent5: The postsynced sound effects added depth to the movie experience.

meanings.definition: A sound recording that has been synchronized with a visual image after filming.
meanings.sent1: The postsynced audio enhanced the overall quality of the film.
meanings.sent2: We needed to add more postsynced tracks to the video project.
meanings.sent3: The postsynced soundtrack brought life to the silent movie.
meanings.sent4: The postsynced voiceover matched the character's lip movements perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The postsynced sound captured the essence of the scene beautifully.
